scripts.db:migrate: tsx -e 'import { runMigrations } from "@deadmansswitch/database"; runMigrations("./migrations").then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })'
scripts.db:seed: tsx -e 'import { seedDatabase } from "@deadmansswitch/database"; import { generateNostrKeypair, encryptData } from "./src/lib/auth"; seedDatabase({ generateNostrKeypair, encryptData }).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })'
scripts.db:seed-pricing: tsx -e 'import { seedPricing } from "@deadmansswitch/database"; seedPricing().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })'
scripts.db:update-users: tsx -e 'import { updateExistingUsers } from "@deadmansswitch/database"; updateExistingUsers().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })'
